transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir, good morning. Hello
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Hanji sir, Dev baat kar rahe the IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello sir, ye lead vagera nahi aa rahi hamari.
Executive: Accha Ravindra sir, leads lead nahi aa rahi purchase karne ke liye?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Accha sir, ye apna Shri Krishna Nursery profile mein aap keh rahe hain leads purchase ke liye nahi hai. Ek second dijiyega sir. Profile khol leta hu. Aap laptop mein dekh rahe hain sir ya phone mein dekh rahe hain leads?
Customer: Phone mein.
Executive: Phone mein dekh rahe hain aap. Ek second dena Ravindra sir.
Executive: Phone mein aap dekh rahe hain.
Executive: Khol raha hu sir, ki profile khul gayi hai almost.
Executive: Theek hai. Ravindra sir, maine bhi khol rakhi hai profile apna aur ye maine apna lead lead pe na filter laga rakha hai recent leads ka India location pe. To usme mujhe sir dikha rahi hai matlab 500, 1000 piece plant ki leads to dikha rahi hai.
Executive: Neem tree ki kaafi sari hai.
Executive: Aur ye aapka beetal plant hai, nursery plant hai, inki leads dikha rahi hai. 500 piece hai, 1000 piece hai. Aur neem tree ki 2000 piece ki hai, 70,000 ka ek order hai Tamil Nadu se. Aur Maharashtra se bhi hai sir 200.
Executive: Aapne sir filter lagaiye. Dekhiye main aapko bata raha hu, aap phone mein click kijiye buylead pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Waha filter pe click karke na aap recent pe dabaiye recent leads pe.
Customer: Recent pe kiya, India kiya.
Executive: Recent pe kiya, India kiya. Theek hai. Aap search mat kijiyega isme. Aap lead dekho niche.
Executive: Neem tree ki bahut sari leads hai jo acche khase order value ki hai. Aur usme party bhi aapka puri detail daal ke maangi hai requirements.
Executive: Aap ye dekho yesterday ki hai, kal ki hai Chennai Tamil Nadu se.
Customer: 2000 plant ki hai.
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: 2000 paudhe ki hai.
Executive: 2000 paudhe ki hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, main abhi dekh leta hu. Mere paas 500 paudhe ki dikha raha hai.
Customer: To 2000 piece to sir acche hi hai na. 2000 usme to aap keh sakte hain deal.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, main aapko Tamil Nadu wale 2000 lenge.
Customer: Tamil Nadu wale jo koi bhi lete hain wo 10,000, 8000, 9000 aise lete hain.
Executive: Accha 10,000, 8000, 9000. 2000 wale nahi hote shayad Tamil Nadu se. Theek hai.
Customer: Ha, aisa aata tha in logo ka bhada nahi banta hai na transport ka.
Executive: Wahi baat hai sir, ha, cost cutting fir wahi ho jayega. Unke local se le lenge wo to. 10,000 piece pe banega bhade ka hisab se. Sir aapne wali lead dekhi, main aapko ek bata raha hu, ye Madurai se theek hai 2000 ki ho gayi aapne bata diya.
Executive: Aur sir ye jo nearby mein hote hain jaise aapke 200 plant agar koi maang raha hai kadam plant ke aapka UP mein hi maang rahe hain Lucknow mein. To aap de sakte hain ye 10,000 ka order value daal rakha hai unhone.
Customer: Kadam ka nikala to nahi hai isme.
Executive: Dekhiye na sir, kadam plant nursery ka maanga hai unhone. 150 plant maange hain. Usne likha hai buyer ko jo plant chahiye wo vertical garden ke liye chahiye. Jo wo unhe bahar lagana chahta hai. Aur usko koi bhi variety of plant mein wo le sakta hai jo outdoor decoration ke liye achcha ho. Aisa koi specific nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi hamare mein kadam nahi nikal raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukna sir, main do din purani hai ye Lucknow Uttar Pradesh ki.
Executive: Rukiye main aapko whatsapp pe bhej raha hu. Call pe rahiye ek second. Whatsapp pe bhi maine aapko bhej raha hu.
Customer: Lekin sir mobile pe kyu nahi dikhata ye?
Executive: Sir, maine aapko dekhiye bataya mobile mein purani lead dikhane mein na wo itni loading nahi leta hai, fetch nahi karta hai. Aur karna hai to aapko kaafi baar click karna padega us pe aur app ko refresh karte rahiye. Aur laptop mein maine aapko bola tha yahi fayda rehta hai same time pe leads refresh hoti hai. Control R dabane se reload hone se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap ek baar whatsapp pe dekhna maine aapko ek photo bheji hai. Ye lead aapke hisab ki hai to aap bataiye iski main aapko link bhej deta hu. Aap purchase kar paoge.
Executive: Maine pehle hi bheja hai dekhiye ek photo bheji hai sir.
Customer: Photo pehle bheji hai.
Executive: Photo dekhiye na bheji hui hai. Aapne dekhi nahi hai. Reading kar raha hu usko.
Customer: Dada, ye to 150 hai, chote paudha hai, ye to wahin se le lenge ye Lucknow se hi.
Executive: Accha. To matlab ye isme deal nahi kar paoge aap 150 paudhe ke hisab se?
Customer: Nahi. Wo aisa na aajkal jyada hi hamara wholesale ka kaam hai. To humko bulk pe hi chahiye wholesale.
Executive: Accha. Sir, jaise maan lijiye koi Punjab se Jalandhar mein maange 1000 piece aapka wo bhi garden plant maang rahe hain koi bhi lagane ke liye wo bhej payenge aap?
Customer: Wo dekhe bheje.
Executive: Maine aapko photo bheji hai dekhiye whatsapp pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isme na sir acche bade order. Ha bataiye sir. Accha isse bade jo bulk ke nikalte hain 10,000, 50,000, 1 lakh wo kaise milte hain?
Executive: Wo sir maine aapko last time bataya tha uska tender lena padta hai. IndiaMART pe aapko tender lena padta hai sir tender.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab aapke nearby mein koi nikla hai jaise maan lijiye tender to aap wo dekh sakte ho. Ab main aapko batau to sabse jyada jo lagte hain aapke nearby mein na UP mein aapko batau UP mein Jhansi mein, Kanpur mein sabse jyada lagta hai. Matlab Kanpur ke aapko bahut sare tender mil jayenge all time. Main aapko dikhata hu ek second 10, 20,000 ke aap bol rahe ho na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek second isme aapke paas aapke paas bamboo plant hota hai kya sir?
Customer: Bamboo hota hai.
Executive: Bamboo hota hai na. Bamboo ka hi aata hai adhikta main isliye puch raha tha. Yellow bamboo plant hai aapke paas?
Executive: Sir ye dekhiye Jaipur Rajasthan ka ek tender bheja hai maine aapko. 8,75,850 ki iski bid chal rahi hai abhi. Matlab tender ki value itni set kari hai inhone maximum itna jayega.
Executive: Photo bheji hai dekhiye padhiye isme likha bhi hai ki sir ki jo tender mein plant chahiye na wo different type ke chahiye ground cover plant matlab jo zameen se hote hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo cover karte hain. Ab sir 8,75,000 mein aapko pata hi hai kitne plants aap laga sakte ho. Ab ek jo flower plant hota hai na aapka uska dekhiye ek maine aapko bheja hai abhi Delhi mein hi nikla hai uska tender. Aur flower plant ki wo quantity jo maang rahe hain wo 2000 hai. Tender value jo ja sakti hai wo 5,04,000 tak ja sakti hai.
Customer: To isme ye tender chalte hain.
Executive: Ha, ye tender chalte rehte hain sir. Ye na aapko GEM portal pe jaake iski bid laga ke na aapko bhi registration dena padta hai form fill karke. Aur aap agar buylead soch rahe ho to tender wale ka bhi buylead nahi dalte hain sir. Kyunki unko pata hai ki ye kaam koi chhote mote supplier ki call message aane lag jayenge enquiry aane lag jayegi. Wo unko bhi cater nahi karte. Tender pe koi bada hi wholesaler hi wo bharta hai unka pura form tab wo PDF submit karta hai waha pe tab jaake uska kaam banta hai. Aur aap jab ye jo main bhej raha hu na aapko photo isme dekhiye seedhe haath pe detail likhi hui hai view tender information. Aap jaise hi pe click karoge aapki ek buylead kategi aur aapke paas party ki puri detail aa jayegi. Authority kisne matlab ye tender release kiya hai, kaunsi authority ne uski detail ho gayi. Uske contact number ho gaye aur jo ek publication document hota hai jisme pura bharte hain wo sab cheeze bhi. To aap ek buylead mein inki detail le lijiye. Agar bina tender ka form fill kare aapke paas number ya email aa gaya waha bhi baat hogi aapki party se tab aap documentation karke karwa lena ye kaam.
Customer: Sir to number unka kaise aata hai contact number?
Executive: Wo sir dekhiye main keh nahi sakta kabhi aa bhi jata hai kabhi nahi bhi aata hai kyunki usme jo contact number hota hai na wo tender ki authority mein jo bhi staff vagera hota hai uska hota hai. Aapko seedha malik ka mil jaye wo cheez nahi hoti. Hmm. Aap ek purchase karke dekhiye usme ho sakta hai mil bhi jaye aapko ye number. Theek hai dekhte hain. Hai na aur ek cheez main aapko bata hu Ravindra sir maine na last time aap se kuch paudho ki photo maangi thi aap se whatsapp pe. Ek baar na sir aap mujhe wo dijiye aapke catalog thodi modify karni hai mujhe. To buylead na aur specific hoke aa paye. Jyada paudhe ki, jyada quantity ki. Theek hai main aapko bhi ek list bhej raha hu fir se jo aapne last time nahi bheje the photo. Aap mujhe wo bas de do photo main usko update karta hu catalog ko. Leads aapke paas aate rahenge aaj. Ha, aaj Thursday hai sir apna Monday ko algorithm refresh hoga. Monday se aur acche lead ho jayenge improve. Theek hai. Bhai sir wo jo main whatsapp kar raha hu aapko wo mera personal number hai Singh sahab aap mujhe us pe call kijiye na. Main hand to hand uthaunga. Abhi aapne customer care pe kiya unhone mere paas ye land kari hai call. To us cheez lengthy ho jati hai. Theek hai. Aur process ke hisab se aapne jo whatsapp wala ye aapka number hai? Ha, jisme 101 hai last mein whatsapp pe main lead jaha bhej raha hu aapko abhi. Wo mera personal number hai aap seedha call karo main utha leta hu. Aur aapka ek kaam karwata hu catalog update karwata hu tender ki information main aapko bhejta hu. Aur ek cheez aur sir ye na Ravindra sir isme buylead ka jab aapne call kiya customer care pe to ticket to main is ticket ko close karunga abhi customer hamara resolve hai agar aap dekh rahe hain lead ki zero. Bas feedback yes de dijiyega sir isme. Theek hai. Okay sir okay. Main aapko whatsapp karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants bulk orders like 10,000, 50,000, 1 lakh.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the profile and recent leads.

- Informed about tender process for bulk orders.

- Shared tender details via WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to modify the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send photos for catalog modification.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, tender, catalog, whatsapp
